raw_body: PERERA – MAVIS – Beloved wife of late Ossie,​ loving mother of Romesh and Prithee,​ mother-in-law of Delo and late Ajith,​ grandmother of Ashan,​ Shevi and Anushka,​ great grandmother of Kiara and Keyden,​ sister of Vernon,​ Arlene,​ Ranjith,​ Shiranthi and Rohan. Cortege leaves A.F. Raymond’s Funeral Parlour on Friday,​ 3rd November,​ for Burial at 3.00 p.m. at the General Cemetery,​ Borella.070722
